text: Antonella Baldini (Born 1966) is an italian actress and voice actress from Milan. She Is the sister of voice actors Oreste Baldini and Nanni Baldini. She is specialized in animated roles such as Amy Rose in Sonic X and Sonic Boom, Timmy Turner in The Fairly OddParents, Beth in Total Drama and Beth Smith in Rick and Morty. Category:1966 births Category:Actors from Milan Category:Italian actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Living people
title: Antonella Baldini
